member.name: T:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask
member.summary: A NAnt task that provides support for running Gallio tests.

summary.para: Gets or sets the relative or absolute path of the application base directory, or null to use a default value selected by the consumer.
If relative, the path is based on the current working directory, so a value of "" causes the current working directory to be used.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.Assemblies
member.summary: The list of test assemblies to execute. This is required.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.DoNotRun
member.summary: Sets whether to load the tests but not run them. This option may be used to produce a report that contains test metadata for consumption by other tools.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.EchoResults
member.summary: Sets whether to echo results to the screen as tests finish. If this option is set to true, the default, test results are echoed to the console in varying detail depending on the current verbosity level. Otherwise only the final summary statistics are displayed.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.Filter
member.summary: Sets the filter expression to apply, which consists of one or more filter rules that may be combined using 'and', 'or', and 'not' and grouped with parentheses. A filter rule consists of a filter key followed by one or more comma-delimited matching values in the form 'key: value, "quoted value", /regular expression/'.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.HintDirectories
member.summary: The list of directories used for loading assemblies and other dependent resources.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.IgnoreAnnotations
member.summary: Sets whether to ignore annotations when determining the result code. If false (default), then error annotations, usually indicative of broken tests, will cause a failure result to be generated.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.PluginDirectories
member.summary: Additional Gallio plugin directories to search recursively.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.ReportDirectory
member.summary: Sets the name of the directory where the reports will be put.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.ReportNameFormat
member.summary: Sets the format string to use to generate the reports filenames.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.ReportTypes
member.summary: A list of the types of reports to generate, separated by semicolons.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.ResultProperty
member.summary: Sets the name of a NAnt property in which the exit code of the tests execution should be stored.

summary.para: Specifies the type, assembly, and parameters of custom test runner extensions to use during the test run in the form: '[Namespace.]Type,Assembly[;Parameters]'.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.RunnerType
member.summary: Sets the type of test runner to use.

summary.para: Enables shadow copying when set to true.
Shadow copying allows the original assemblies to be modified while the tests are running. However, shadow copying may occasionally cause some tests to fail if they depend on their original location.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.ShowReports
member.summary: Sets whether to show generated reports in a window using the default system application registered to the report file type.

member.name: P:Gallio.NAntTasks.GallioTask.StatisticsPropertiesPrefix
member.summary: Sets the prefix that will be used for the statistics result properties.

summary.para: Gets or sets the relative or absolute path of the working directory or null to use a default value selected by the consumer.
If relative, the path is based on the current working directory, so a value of "" causes the current working directory to be used.
